'''1.21.05''' is a minor update to {{el|ee}}, released on September 3, 2024.<ref>{{cite|url=https://edusupport.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/23323615654164-What-s-New-in-the-Cloud-Update-v1-21-05|title=What's New in the Cloud Update (v1.21.05)|website=Minecraft Education Support}}</ref> It now supports cloud world backup to OneDrive in Mac and iOS, and fixes some bugs.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
;Cloud world backup
* Mac and iOS now support cloud world backup to OneDrive.

== Fixes ==
* Performance improvements while Coding.
* Various stability and performance bug fixes.</onlyinclude>
